name: Bankless
title: Virtuals is a country for AI agents #aicrypto #ai #aiagents #podcast #crypto
text:
Synopsis
Virtuals is positioning itself as a crypto ecosystem modeled after a country, with AI agents as citizens, a native token as currency, and a transaction tax revenue model.

Key Insights
- Virtuals is conceptualized as a "country" for AI agents, where each agent is viewed as a productive asset or company
- Citizenship in Virtuals is granted to agents with a liquidity pair on the platform
- The Virtuals token is designed to function as the country's native currency
- The platform implements a transaction tax on trades, serving as a primary revenue generation mechanism
- Agents can participate in trade and generate revenue within the Virtuals ecosystem
